def test_regression_3678(self):
    local = {}
    fun = ('def f(foo, *args, bar="", **kwargs):'
           '    return foo, args, bar')
    exec(fun, {}, local)

    g = head_from_fun(local['f'])
    g(1)
    g(1, 2, 3, 4, bar=100)
    with pytest.raises(TypeError):
        g(bar=100)
